p: GC parameters were as follows: The carrier gas and make-up gas were high pure helium and nitrogen, respectively. The carrier gas (helium) was set at a flow rate of 1.0 mL·min −1. The inlet temperature was 200 °C with a split ratio of 10:1 and the pressure was 11.6 psi. The column oven temperature was initially set at 60 °C for 5 min, and then ramped to 200 °C at 5 °C·min −1 for 5 min, and after that, it was warmed up to 300 °C at 10 °C·min −1.
